Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter in relation to authorizing the department of transportation to extend the date of the franchise for the operation and maintenance of bus stop shelters.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 2000012 ZSR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49 to allow a stadium with a capacity in excess of 2500 seats pursuant to Section 74-41.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 2000013 ZSR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49 to permit a public parking lot with a maximum or capacity of 1040 spaces.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Sectin 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 2000014 ZSR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District No. 49 to permit development over a railroad or transit right of way or yard.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C2000016 ZSR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49 to allow the modification of Sections 62-736, 62-351(b)(4), and 62-422.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 000018 PCR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located north of Richmond Terrace and west of the St. George Ferry Terminal, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49, to facilitate the constructino of a stadium.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) fo the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Site Selection Stadium, Staten Island(C000018PCR)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 200019 PPR pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition of one (1) city-owned property for a Sports Stadium, located west of the St. George Ferry Terminal and north of Richmond Terrace, Borough of Staten Island, in Council District No. 49.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council Pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Sports Stadium. Staten Island (C 2000019 PPR)
